paintings.name: War And Peace
paintings.description:
canvas - 100% linen,
oil painting

in the Library of the President of the Russian Federation

As we understand the Tale of the ... "Tempter Angel on the shoulder
.... Whispering into ones mind and soul, which way to go ???
The two extremes ... the two worlds of conflict .... A person always
has the right to choose the direction one goes.
Painting shows alleged reality, in which shows, in fact, it is
impossible to recognize the difference by ear-the words ... World
which sounds like Peace, it is not Possible for Russian people this
separable. By choosing the dark side - we lose it all at once! By
choosing the brighter side of Goodness ... we have both the world and peace

blogposts.title: Per aspera ad astra
blogposts.content:
С августа я участвую в международной арт-выставки «Мяч в искусстве», которая состоится в Башкирском государственном художественном музее им. М.В. Нестерова

Финальной точкой арт-турне призвана стать Доха (Катар) в канун проведения следующего Чемпионата мира по футболу FIFA в 2022 году. https://gtrk.tv/novosti/139196-ufe-proydet-mezhdunarodnaya-art-vystavka-myach-iskusstve?utm_medium=social&utm_source=whatsapp&fbclid=IwAR0l63yrWE2S4abmTQB6IUI5-KYZKcYAeF_qq19N3TMdCsP6ORkf9eG1Dgo

blogposts.title: the International Prize "Artist of the Year 2019"
blogposts.content: I am honored to have received a special award at the International Prize "Artist of the Year 2019" - Mantua Social Theater. I want to thank all of those who chose me for this very special honor. I especially want to thank Mr. Salvatore Russo, Mr. Francesco Saverio Russo and Mr. Marco Rebuzz for everything that was done by them on my behalf.

blogposts.title: MONACO CHARITY FILM FESTIVAL
blogposts.content: I am honored to have participated in the  MONACO CHARITY FILM FESTIVAL. I want to thank Mr. Vicente-Andres Zaragoza,  Founder & Chairman of PFG for his invitation. I can't even express how much I enjoyed being a part of this very special event. I've met so many wonderful people and created memories that will be with me for the rest of my life. I hope we can do this again soon  😊

blogposts.content:
c 27 февраля по 10 марта
Финалист Лондонской премии 21st Century Icon Awards 2018
Обладатель престижной Премии International Prize Giulio Cesare 2018
Обладатель венецианской Премии International Prize of NATIONS - Tribute to TIZIANO 2018
Обладатель флорентийской премии International Prize Leonardo Da Vinci
Эксперт Международной Федерации Искусства и Культуры ICAF

Выставки работ Юлии Зелинской с успехом прошли в Майями, Лос-Анджелесе, Нью-Йорке, Гонконге, Сеуле, Риме, Флоренции, Венеции, Вене.
Свои новые работы, художник представит строгому московскому зрителю в галерее DEVE 27 февраля 2018 года в рамках своей персональной выставки Фантаст Реализм Юлии Зелинской.
Вход свободный. Требуется регистрация.
Messenger или DEVE.Moscow@gmail.com

blogposts.title: Art Without Borders: Modern Leaders Through the Eyes of Artists
blogposts.content:
I am going to carry out an International Call for Artists, "Art Without Borders: Modern Leaders Through the Eyes of Artists," during which displays of modern presidents and other acting leaders will be exhibited. The purpose of this promotion is to help artists establish contacts with each other and to hold joint exhibitions in different countries.

- If you are an artist and you have a portrait of a leader, please write to Yuliya Zelinskaya at: yuliya@zelinskaya-yuliya.com.
The portraits judged to b the best will appear in the publication.

- If you are a gallery owner and you are interested in future exhibitions on the subject, "Modern Leaders through the Eyes of Artists," please write to Yuliya Zelinskaya at:
zelinskaya.yuliya.art@gmail.com

The promotion is valid until July 1

- Russia's President Vladimir Vladimirovich Putin - PAINTER: Yuliya Zelinskaya

- Donald J Trump - PAINTER: Saskia Vugts

- Emmanuel Macron. Regard vers l’avenir. - PAINTER: Nikita Manokhin

- Philippine Senator Emmanuel D. Pacquiao -PAINTER : Ismael Esber

Philippine former Speaker of the house Feliciano "Sonny" Belmonte - PAINTER: Ismael Esber

- Portrait of Palestinian President Yasser Arafat -PAINTER: Liaouraci Salim

- Alain Berset - PAINTER : Дарья Дмитриевна (Daria Dmitrievna)

- Barack Hussein Obama - Former President of the United States Of America - PAINTER : Richard Mensah

- Nana Akufo Addo - President of the Republic of Ghana - PAINTER : Richard Mensah


-- Putin and Trump - PAINTER : Julia Skornyakova

blogposts.title: International artists group exhibition in New York City
blogposts.content:
I would like to Pay-tribute to Michael Lam & Artosino Gallery in New York for including my paintings in their big screen digital art exhibition.

A digital exhibition - VISION ART MEDIA
Beginning of the 2019 , We ushered in the first "New York Big Apple International Artists ' works in Digital Exhibition". The international art exhibition was curated and produced by Michael Lam, the founder of New York's VISION Art Media. He carefully selected 56 outstanding artists from 29 countries and regions to participate in the exhibition. Reflecting the creation and expertise of artists in different fields.

blogposts.title: Выставка живописных работ Юлии Зелинской «Зачарованный мир» работает в галерее L’accent Russe
blogposts.content:
Источник: артМосковия

Удивительный и чарующий мир Вселенной, который открывается с первого взгляда на картины Юлии Зелинской, захватывает, увлекает и открывает новый взгляд на мир. На мир вокруг вас, на мир внутри вас. Бесконечно теплая энергетика, которую транслируют полотна Юлии, удивительным образом уносит из реального мира в загадочный и магический мир грез, при этом наполняя реальный мир красками, надеждами и вдохновением.

Творчество Юлии Зелинской оценили простые зрители и профессионалы во всем мире. Ее работы были представлены на неоднократных международных выставках и биеннале, находятся в частных коллекциях и собраниях как за рубежом (Вена, Рим, Флоренция, Гонконг, Венеция, Майами – вот далеко не полный список), так и в России, включая президента нашей страны. Престижные награды, привезенные из Рима, Венеции, Лондона лишь подтверждают ее неординарный талант.

Завершит свою работу выставка 31 декабря 2018 года. Постетить её можно в галерее L’accent Russe (Москва, Ветошный переулок, д. 9. ТЦ «Никольский пассаж»).

blogposts.title: 21st Century Icon Award
blogposts.content:
21st Century Icon Awards, Supported by ELITE, London Stock Exchange Group - https://www.21stcenturyiconawards.com/

It is truly a great honor for me to be here. My Heart is filled with gratitude to have been nominated for the prestigious 21st Century Icon Award. To be recognized by one's contemporaries is something that has often eluded even the greatest artists. I prefer to be alive when I am honored. But serious ... painting, as you all know, is a solitary profession. And so it means the world to me to be embraced by like-minded, creative people, such as all of you. To be understood, to be accepted, to be welcomed into a community such as this, is a priceless gift.

I love my life as a painter because Art, whether it's in the form of a drawing, a symphony, a dance, a poem, or any other art form, is what connects all of us as human beings. Artistic expression communicates emotions and thoughts in the most basic and direct way. It is a shared experience that brings us closer to each other, regardless of race, nationality, religious beliefs, or gender. It inspires us, moves us, and makes us feel deeply. This is why I create.

When we celebrate the success of each new generation of artists, we acknowledge that art is a living thing, a vibrant thing, and as it needs to be nurtured if it is to thrive from generation to generation. When we invest in new artists, we build their self-confidence and self-assurance. And with that self-confidence and self-assurance, they will be motivated and encouraged to create more and greater art. That is exactly what is happening right here and right now, and again, I express my most sincere thanks to you for this. New artists offer fresh and original perspectives. These perspectives are windows into realities. We may never have known existed. Great art does not reflect the world. It transforms it. This is what inspires me to lift a paintbrush every day and touch it to canvas. This is my mission in life. This is my passion.

I am very grateful to you and to all of you who have supported me. I thank you for making it possible for me and other artists to continue to do the work. Now, more than ever, the world needs great art, because great art. I am Yuliya Zelinskaya. Please keep your dreams alive, as well.

blogposts.title: Internationaler ART-EVENT
blogposts.content:
Internationale Künstler ( Japan, Slowakei, Philippinen, Indien, Russland, Ukraine, Serbien usw.) kommen ins Kunsthaus-Unterolberndorf zum 20 Jahre Jubiläum und um gemeinsam mit heimischen Künstlern kreativ tätig zu sein.
Vernissage, Festakt, Kunstmeile, Sturmfest, Kellergassenfest, Zuschauen, spannende Kontakte, usw.

the  International Prize GIULIO CESARE - ART EMPEROR
blogposts.content:

It is exhilarating to be able to create and manifest my ideas and I give many thanks to all that have supported and encouraged me to keep my dream alive.

blogposts.title: Venice
blogposts.content: I am honored to have received a special award at the International Biennial of Nations  in The Court of Misericordia in Venice, Italy. I am thrilled that my artworks will be on exhibition at the Diocesan Museum Francesco Gonzaga - Mantua. I want to thank all of those who chose me for this very special honor. I especially want to thank Mr. Salvatore Russo, Mr. Francesco Saverio Russo and Mr. Marco Rebuzz for everything that was done by them on my behalf.

blogposts.title: CVH 1st Class Magazine - International Humanitarian Family magazine
blogposts.content:
To my dear friends , I have the pleasure of announcing that an interview that I recently did was published in an esteemed magazine. Thank you kindly to Christina Howard, Aleksandr Cassandra Rockefeller, Judith Barbara Rosenblum and Pamela A Rivers ❤️💞💓

CVH 1st Class Magazine - International Humanitarian Family magazine

Here you can browse through the magazine
origin: http://www.youblisher.com/p/1842294-CVH-1st-Class-Group

en: In 2011, graduated from the College of the Russian Academy of Justice under the Supreme Court and the Supreme Arbitration Court of Moscow (Diploma of Lawyer, lawyer with in-depth training)
In 2014 graduated from the Russian Academy of Justice under the Supreme Court and the Supreme Arbitration Court of Moscow (Diploma of Lawyer)
Since my childhood, I have exhibited a fascination with art, especially after my first colors merged together and became my own rainbow for me to see.

I found myself drawing something almost everyday and I was encourage to continue this unknown desire to create images, shapes and blend colours that makes no sense to the eyes of others but made sense to mine. And one day, it all came together and I was given the opportunity, to study painting in Art School. I saw a new world of Ideas and my imagination started to run wild.

At the age of 22, I was have two-month travel throughout Europe, visiting some of the best museums and some theaters. It was an adventure that I will never forget. I have observed many aspects of art that I have never seen before, through the eyes of professionals.

My inspiration is to spread the Beauty of Art while touching the eyes and hearts of those who are the lovers of Creativity on Canvas. But, most of all,  to inspire others, to feel and see what the creative mind can do, and to join in and create their own art piece no matter what one's abilities may be. This desire I have is that even if only one person characterizes and shows interest in my Art, to open up their own eyes in seeing their dreams and imagination toward art come alive for them, as it has done for me.  Maybe they will take this opportunity in pursuing Art during the lifetime of dreams and fantasies yet to come, as I have and am doing now.

Now, I want to present a vision of the world... Through my eyes, through my soul and my world view... maybe it's a little naive, demonstratively sensitive, but I hope you enjoy my direction in painting. I personally called my style of art:  “Theater Realism” [ZY] Theater this is a place between “Fantasy and Reality. I would like to portray these same emotions of strength and of impressions and of creativity through to the many observers of my dreams and fantasies...

The Theater bring us joy and love, eternal delight excitement hearts. Theater is full of mix emotions, while never the same at any one time, as with joy and love, excitement and disappointment, heart filled love and drama, plus, so much more. There is a Method of presenting the action in the theater, aimed at the exaltation of all the senses one possesses, as each person viewing leaves with their own perspectives of the action they have seen and remember.

My painting pursues the same goals: to create a sense of what you see, of the space between fantasy and reality, and exaltation of these senses. So, my desire is to have an Art Lover who sees my Paintings, takes into consideration of my works of imagination….well suited to the modern day.

So, let me personally welcome you with the warmest greetings and give you a private tour of my Collection of Art , thru the Glass of my inner visions of realism, touching the shadows of impressionism, flirting with the quiet melodies of surrealism, and the odor of symbolism finishing the palate with the taste of childhood.

“Everyone has the ability to create, but will you take the time to be creative and to find your soul of your creativity?”

Zelinskaya Yuliya
To All Those Who Love Art...

indexConf.aboutLong:
To Art Lovers all over the World, It is my deepest pleasure to share my Art to the World, so everyone can share my joy and to others if they choose and to see my dreams of my manifestations come to life in my works, as I have done and as I will be doing. This is my living and if you see something that captures your attention or you want a personal exclusive painting, make a note of it and contact me, Yuliya Zelinskaya through my website and I'm sure we can come to an agreement to the ownership of any of my art pieces or works of art!

Thank you, so much, for taking your time to view my dreams of Art, and may it have open your mind to new adventures and much Love to those whom encourage and support my art and me!
